recipesJson.name: Raspberry Cookie Bar #MixinVixens
recipesJson.author: mlNikon
recipesJson.description: This is my take on the profile picture for the week. A cookie bar with raspberry jam and cream cheese frosting. VT shisha raspberry is a really good jammy raspberry with a ton of body but it doesn't have any vibrancy or top notes and that is where FA raspberry comes in. Cap Vanilla Cupcake is here to provide some more body and sweetness for the frosting with OOO Vanilla Custard Cheesecake playing the main role in the cream cheese frosting.
